holidays.title: International Dance Day
holidays.description: Put your dancing shoes on and get ready to step out!

holidays.title: Bob Wills Day
holidays.description: Celebrating The King Of Western Swing, Bob Wills, right here with us at National Today.

holidays.title: Day of Trees
holidays.description: Though celebrated by many other countries as Arbor Day, Day of Trees is special in Colombia.

holidays.title: Eeyore’s Birthday
holidays.description: Friends of the Forest never forget to make animals feel special on this day.

holidays.title: Independent Bookstore Day
holidays.description: Join us as we turn the page and learn why books matter so much.

holidays.title: International Astronomy Day
holidays.description: Don’t have a telescope? Here's how to celebrate like a true galactic scout.

holidays.title: International Sculpture Day
holidays.description: Get your hammer and chisel ready, it’s International Sculpture Day! Celebrate right here with us!

holidays.title: Machynlleth Comedy Festival
holidays.description: Forget all your worries and get ready to celebrate the good times at Machynlleth Comedy Festival.

holidays.title: National Go Birding Day
holidays.description: It’s time to break out the binoculars and observe the activities of our feathered friends.

holidays.title: National Kiss of Hope Day
holidays.description: Learn how to embody hope and work with your partner to support your household.

holidays.title: National Peace Rose Day
holidays.description: We celebrate one of the world’s most exquisite flowers that symbolize peace.

holidays.title: National Pool Opening Day
holidays.description: See how pool owners across the country take care of their pools in preparation for summer.

holidays.title: National Rebuilding Day
holidays.description: Roll up your sleeves and grab your tools, it’s time to get building.

holidays.title: National Sense of Smell Day
holidays.description: Don’t turn your nose up at this day dedicated to preserving your sense of smell.

holidays.title: National Shrimp Scampi Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the delicious dish of shrimp cooked with butter, garlic, lemon juice, and white wine.

holidays.title: National Supply Chain Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the global supply chain and discover how it is connected to you.

holidays.title: National Zipper Day
holidays.description: We take many things in life for granted and the humble zipper is one of them.

holidays.title: Poem In Your Pocket Day
holidays.description: “I would define ... the poetry of words as the rhythmical creation of beauty” — Edgar Allan Poe.

holidays.title: Spring Astronomy Day
holidays.description: Join us as we gaze up at the heavens this Spring Astronomy Day!

holidays.title: Viral Video Day
holidays.description: Have that video you think will go viral? Well, put it on the internet and hope!

holidays.title: We Jump The World Day
holidays.description: Join us as we (free) run to celebrate We Jump The World Day.

holidays.title: World Healing Day
holidays.description: We've got the best ways to spend this day with the most rejuvenating activities.

holidays.title: World Tai Chi and Qigong Day
holidays.description: Take part in a global event that promotes the importance of maintaining your well-being.

holidays.title: World Veterinary Day
holidays.description: Today, we are celebrating veterinarians and the bonds between people and animals!

holidays.title: World Wish Day
holidays.description: Stay hopeful and happy, it's World Wish Day and some wishes are about to be granted.

holidays.title: Dale Earnhardt’s Birthday
holidays.description: You can still see the iconic mustache and the number 3 anywhere NASCAR fans assemble.

holidays.title: Jerry Seinfeld’s Birthday
holidays.description: Appreciate the charisma and sense of humor of this super-famous stand-up comedian.

holidays.title: Master P’s Birthday
holidays.description: From the projects of Louisiana to an empire, nothing seems impossible for this self-made man.

holidays.title: Ray Gantt’s Birthday
holidays.description: Discover all the insider details about this reality star's journey to fame.

holidays.title: Roman Dirge’s Birthday
holidays.description: The creepier the better for the Michelangelo of the macabre comic books.

holidays.title: Willie Nelson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ain't it funny how time slips away? Before you know it, you've recorded some 350 songs.
